meanings.definition: The act of sending or delivering something quickly or efficiently.
meanings.sent1: The expressage of the package was impressive.
meanings.sent2: I paid extra for expressage to ensure the document arrived on time.
meanings.sent3: The expressage of the pizza was so fast, it beat the speed of light!
meanings.sent4: Her expressage of emotions through dance was truly captivating.
meanings.sent5: The expressage of the news spread like wildfire throughout the town.

meanings.definition: The cost or fee associated with sending something quickly or efficiently.
meanings.sent1: The expressage for overnight delivery was quite high.
meanings.sent2: I was surprised by the expressage for shipping the package.
meanings.sent3: The expressage for the service felt like a small fortune.
meanings.sent4: The expressage for the VIP treatment was worth every penny.
meanings.sent5: The expressage for the express train was a bit steep but worth it for the speed.
